statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_name LIKE '%Honda%' ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, mechanic_name, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, frequency FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND cost > 100 ORDER BY cost;
SELECT mechanic_name, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE frequency = 'Monthly' AND schedule_date >= now() ORDER BY schedule_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM maintenance WHERE mechanic='John Doe';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, mileage FROM vehicle WHERE mileage < 50000;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY make DESC, model ASC;
SELECT make, model, mileage FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda';
SELECT * FROM maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND cost > 50 ORDER BY maintenance_date;

SELECT vehicle.make, schedule.next_maintenance_date, maintenance.mechanic FROM vehicle JOIN schedule ON vehicle.vehicle_id = schedule.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance ON vehicle.vehicle_id = maintenance.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance.cost < 100;

SELECT schedule.vehicle_id, COUNT(maintenance.maintenance_id) AS num_maintenance FROM schedule LEFT JOIN maintenance ON schedule.vehicle_id = maintenance.vehicle_id GROUP BY schedule.vehicle_id HAVING num_maintenance > 3 ORDER BY num_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT record_id, service_date, service_description FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, mileage FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Honda' AND year < 2015;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make,model,mileage FROM vehicle ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost >= 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT service_description, cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle JOIN maintenance_records ON vehicle.vehicle_id = maintenance_records.vehicle_id WHERE service_description LIKE '%oil change%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT * FROM mechanic ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT schedule_type, frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency <= 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT vehicle.make, maintenance_record.date, mechanic.name FROM vehicle JOIN maintenance_record ON vehicle.id = maintenance_record.vehicle_id JOIN mechanic ON maintenance_record.cost < 1000;

SELECT maintenance_plan.planned_date, maintenance_schedule.schedule_type, mechanic.phone FROM maintenance_plan JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_plan.schedule_id = maintenance_schedule.id JOIN mechanic ON maintenance_plan.mechanic_id = mechanic.id WHERE maintenance_schedule.frequency = 6;
